sentence.text: But there was no doubt who Tina took after ; she was tall and slim and strongly built , just like her father .
Unhesitatingly he said , ` She was tall and slim with dark hair and eyes .
She is young slim and beautiful .
If you give yourself six months to a year to understand yourself better , gradually to alter your eating and exercise behaviour , you will become slim and healthy and you will stay that way .
If you have really strong will-power and become slim , reverting back to your old eating habits often puts the weight straight back on again .
Neighbours and friends keep telling me I look slim … .
Effortlessly slim people are governed by their body 's requirement for food and are bullied by messages from the body -- ` That 's it , old chap , I 've had enough " at the appropriate time .
Her slim body shakes with electric shocks as paramedics try to restart her heart .
As he kneaded her luscious hanging fruit , so he allowed his full weight to crush her slim body until she collapsed on to her stomach .
She had specified fair hair , slim build , regular features , smooth skin .
They are tall and proud in their bearing and though they have a slim build they are surprisingly strong and agile for their size .
She 's all of five feet five but I suppose her slim build gives the impression of being petite …
At that moment a slim figure flung itself out of the shadows to tumble Lefevre 's giant adversary from his feet .
Maybe forty , I judged , with regular features , no make-up and a slim wiry figure in shirt , sweater and jeans .
Clambering out of bed , the tall dark-haired woman flung a silk robe around her slim figure .
A slim fair-haired girl in a long black dress was threading between the ranks of spectators , holding open a bag into which people dropped folded-up pieces of paper .
A slim attractive girl in jeans hovered near , her pose suggesting I could approach her ; but before I could do so Señora Sanchez accosted me .
A voice stirred her from her reverie and Katherine turned to see a tall slim sandy-haired girl enter the room followed by a smaller rounder figure .
A tall slim man stood in the doorway to the bathroom .
The slim man had seized the whip , and after two more murderous kicks , commenced to thrash the defenceless coachman .
The slim man , the first to reach the floor of the ravine , had taken cover in a nest of boulders .

He had grown into a slim blond young man , slightly ashen from his long hospital hours , a little frenzied and erratic in his gestures which spoke of bouts of sleeplessness and an adrenaline-fuelled energy .
The myth goes that the slim person likes , indeed prefers , foods like cottage cheese , plain yogurt , salads , crispbreads , low-fat spreads , and other foods so often described in diets .
The slim person will have a couple of chocolates in the day , then stop .
However , recent research indicates that the slim person is not necessarily eating in a way to promote maximum health .
At the RSPCA 's Centenary Conference in Oxford , a tall slim woman with greying hair drawn back in a pony tail , unobtrusively dressed in a shirt and slacks , came to the podium .
Opening the catalogue , a gnarled and beringed hand pointed to a slim dark-skinned young woman modelling a trouser suit .
At first Delia Sutherland could not place this slim woman with thick red hair lapping her head in curls .
Mrs Porter came in , eyeing the slim young woman in the cream and sky-blue sundress that set off her sun-blonde hair and fair colouring .
In the case of an over-large meal this would mean that the slim people would put down their knives and forks and leave some food .
He pointed across the room to a slim lad wearing jeans and a T-shirt and potting balls from all angles .
White and slim , he had dark hair and a moustache .
If you 're slim , honest and have a good sense of humour then send your photos to this lovesick laddie .
Tall , slim and disarmingly natural , she laughs freely and talks frankly .
Being small , slim and nimble , he can squeeze through the smallest of open windows .
